price: 8. Markay yidhaahdeen: Yuusuf iyo walaalki3 buu naga jecel yahay aabbaheen innagoo ah koox (xoog iyo tiro badan toban nin ah). Hubaal aabbaheen wuu gefsan yahay.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالُواْ لَيُوسُفُ وَأَخُوهُ أَحَبُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِينَا مِنَّا وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّ أَبَانَا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ
footnotes: 3. Binyaamiin, oo ay isku hooyo ahaayeen Yuusuf c.s.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh qālū layūsufu wa-akhūhu aḥabbu ilā abīnā minnā wanaḥnu ʿuṣ'batun inna abānā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
